1.title: Introducing Yourself
1.intro: Welcome to level A1. Here you will learn the basics of communication.

grammar.title: Personal Pronouns
grammar.info: Learn how to refer to yourself and others (I, you, he/she, etc.).

grammar.title: Verb 'to be'
grammar.info: Understand how to use 'am', 'is', 'are' correctly in basic sentences.

grammar.title: Articles
grammar.info: Learn the use of 'a', 'an', and 'the' in English.

2.title: Objects and Movements
2.intro: This lesson teaches you about common objects and movement verbs.

grammar.title: Present Tense
grammar.info: Learn how to describe current actions using the present tense.

grammar.title: Accusative
grammar.info: Understand how to form sentences with direct objects (e.g., I eat an apple).

grammar.title: Dative
grammar.info: Learn how to use indirect objects in sentences (e.g., I give him a book).

2.test: Describe your daily routine using 3 actions.

3.title: Daily Routines
3.intro: In this lesson, you learn how to talk about your daily activities.

grammar.title: Present Tense Verbs
grammar.info: Use present tense verbs to describe daily actions.

grammar.title: Time Expressions
grammar.info: Learn how to express time such as hours, days, and daily routines.

3.test: Create a timetable of your typical day.

1.title: Introduction to German Language
1.intro: Welcome to level A2. Here you will deepen your language skills.

grammar.title: Noun Genders
grammar.info: Understand the concept of gender in German nouns (der, die, das).

grammar.title: Modal Verbs
grammar.info: Learn verbs like 'can', 'must', and how to use them in context.
